head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths KEMPEN, FLORENCE M. (NEE ASCH)

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths KEMPEN, FLORENCE M. (NEE ASCH)

block.p: KEMPEN--Florence M. (nee Asch). On January 21, 2005. Of North Bergen, N.J., formerly of Little Falls, N.J. Beloved wife of the late Gaston. Devoted mother of Judith J. Wilson (Michael) and Robert Baumol (Sherry). Dear sister of Elsie Asch (Dr. Avila Kamen). Loving grandmother of Karen Makey, Deborah Rossi, Rob Viola, Adam M. Baumol and Lauren A. Bamol. Great grandmother of Joshua Van Voorhis and Hannah Rossi. Service Monday, 12:30PM at Gutterman-Musicant, Hackensack, N.J. For information call 1-800-522-0588.
